title: Executive Order 10248-Transfer of Certain Lands from the Sacramento, California, Land District to the Los Angeles California, Land District
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 2253 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (43 U.S.C 127), I hereby transfer the following-described lands from the Sacramento, California, land district to the Los Angeles, California, land district, such transfer to become effective on June 16, 1951:

HARRY S. TRUMAN
THE WHITE HOUSE,
June 2, 1951
citation: Harry S Truman, Executive Order 10248-Transfer of Certain Lands from the Sacramento, California, Land District to the Los Angeles California, Land District Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/279198
